text: <@U6GNQ7JBU> I've tried several; 1012 WC, which is the postal code of one of the oldest coffeeshops here in Amsterdam, I've tried 6522 AX, which is where Nina Simone lived when she held residence in the Netherlands, and 1073 BD, where the former Queen of the Netherlands supposedly does her groceries.

I get spam calls from this one number almost every week day - fortunately I have a Google Pixel, so instead of me answering they always get the Google assistant. They appear to have software now detecting when that triggers because it auto hangs up. next time - I’m going to answer, wait until it actually puts the telemarketer on the line, then state that I’m the google assistant, and carry on a meaningless conversation with them.

“Tell me more about why you are calling Jon.” “you’ve won a free cruise to -” “is your matter urgent?” “free cruise through the carribean..” “I’m sorry, I can’t find any results for ‘free cruise through the carribean’ I did find one for 5 grand, would you like me to schedule your cruise?” “uhhh…. sure?”

“Okay I’m ready for your credit card number.” “nevermind” “I’m sorry I didn’t hear you clearly, please tell me your credit card number” “cancel”
“I cannot cancel unless you remove this number from your call list.” *phone click*

Thats what I imagine going down.
that is exactly how it will happen

when I was a kid and we got a telemarketer on the phone my parents used to hand the phone to me.

Almost managed to sell a telemarketer a half eaten box of oreos. He hung up after I told him “i’m sorry. I finished the box”
I like to think that I was the precursor to <https://www.ted.com/talks/james_veitch_this_is_what_happens_when_you_reply_to_spam_email?language=en>
lol my mom was savage about it and would just pretend to be teary eyed and say "I'm sorry, they aren't here, they passed away last week..."
“Are you their oncologist? :droplet: please tell me it was a false positive”
I never went down that dark road, just messed with em, narrated my progress in Metal Gear solid to them.
My mom used to just start yelling at them in French
